title: Covid Data
description: Covid Data in the United States

date.description: The date the data was last updated.

death.description: The number of comfirmed or probable deaths from COVID19.

deathIncrease.description: The increase in number of deaths from COVID19 from the previous day.

hospitalizedCumulative.description: The cumulative number of individuals hospitalized for COVID19.

hospitalizedCurrently.description: The number of individuals currently in the hospital with COVID19.

hospitalizedIncrease.description: The increase in number of hospitalizations for COVID19 from the previous day.

inIcuCurrently.description: The number of people currently in the ICU with COVID19.

inIcuCumulative.description: The cumulative number of people that have been in the ICU with COVID19.

negative.description: Number of negative COVID19 test results.

negativeIncrease.description: The increase in number of negative COVID19 test results.

onVentilatorCumulative.description: Number of people on ventilator due to COVID19.

OnVentilatorCurrently.description: The current number of people on a ventilator due to COVID19.

pending.description: The total number of COVID19 tests still pending.

positive.description: The total number of positive COVID19 tests.

positiveIncrease.description: The increase in number of positive COVID19 tests from the previous day.

recovered.description: The number of people marked as recovered from COVID19.

totalTestResults.description: The total number of COVID19 tests performed.

totalTestResultsIncrease.description: The increase in number of total COVID19 test results from the previous day.
